channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Time Magazine appears to accidentally publish embargoed story confirming new Anthropic model
item.description: Someone also appears to have published a full scrape of the Time article online on the news aggregator app Newsbreak.

item.title: The IPO market looks healthy as Hinge Health and MNTN rally after pricing at the high end of their ranges
item.description: The market for initial public offerings continues to gear up after an absence of deals in recent weeks.

item.title: Enchant launches zero-equity accelerator for gaming and AI startups
item.description: Enchant is launching a new zero-equity accelerator for gaming and AI startups, with applications now open for its three-month program.

item.title: The stock market is ignoring how Trump’s policies are damaging the dollar and global economic growth
item.description: Trump’s tariffs stunned Main Street. Now they could starve Wall Street.
